…literally raking in millions of dollars to themselves.

This payola is called corruption. It is corruption. Millions of  taxpayer dollars now are slated for Senators Graham, Hagerty, Hawley,  Sullivan, Tuberville, Johnson, Lummis, and Blackburn. Each is teed up  to personally rake in a minimum of $500,000 up to $1.5 million.

Meanwhile, the American people…
